definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself

sentences.english: This paper describes how to effectively eliminate or reduce the vibration in designing a shift lever.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了变速杆系统的减振设计及其效果。

sentences.english: The design principle of laminated damping steel sheet is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了层压减振复合钢板的设计原则。

sentences.english: The main object of the third chapter is to design the dual mass flywheel (DMFW).
sentences.chinese: 第三章主要目的是设计双质量飞轮减振器。

sentences.english: Its damping effects is compared with shearing damper with high-damping rubber.
sentences.chinese: 最后将其与高阻尼剪切型拉索减振器进行了比较。

sentences.english: An optimum method is studied for choosing the blade spacing for vibration-free face-milling cutters in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究出减振端铣刀齿间角的一种优化方法。

sentences.english: Besides, effective measures of vibration reduction are taken.
sentences.chinese: 此外，采取了有效的工程减振措施。

sentences.english: A diagrammatic method is employed to compute shock absorber force at compression stroke.
sentences.chinese: 提出了计算压缩行程减振器阻力的图解法。

sentences.english: Replaced nose gear shock strut charging valve, no leakage in GND check.
sentences.chinese: 更换前起落架减振支柱充气活门，地面检查无渗漏。

sentences.english: The paper mainly discuss the structural design of vibration reduction table and its self-adjusting mechanism toward horizontal.
sentences.chinese: 重点讨论了减振台的结构设计和自动水平校正的机理。

sentences.english: The result is "softer" shock-absorber characteristics and, consequently, a high level of ride comfort.
sentences.chinese: 它的结果是软减振器特性和很好的平顺性。

sentences.english: The key parameter of the auto-car sock absorber is the response speed of the damping force.
sentences.chinese: 汽车液力式减振器的关键参数是其阻尼力的响应速度。

sentences.english: Vibration energy dissipation design is performed for a pedestrian bridge with energy dissipation systems.
sentences.chinese: 采用减振装置对某大跨人行天桥进行了消能减振设计。

sentences.english: Vibration energy dissipation design is performed for a pedestrian bridge with energy dissipation systems.
sentences.chinese: 采用减振装置对某大跨人行天桥进行了消能减振设计。

sentences.english: The results shows that it can more effectivelly control the cables vibration.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，粘性剪切型减振器具有更好的减振性能。

sentences.english: The results shows that it can more effectivelly control the cables vibration.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，粘性剪切型减振器具有更好的减振性能。

sentences.english: Engine mounts, Shock absorber struts, Mountings, Flexible disc, Boots.
sentences.chinese: 发动机悬置，减振底座，衬套，连接器，防尘套。

definition: to support/to bear the weight of (a building)
